data.message: Safety system maintenance triad: 1) Regression suite (test-safety-gates.py) with should-block/should-allow cases for each invariant, 2) Verification script (verify-safety-system.py) checking hookify enabled, rules present, hook integrity via hash, telemetry writable, 3) Restore script (restore-hooks.py) to re-apply patched hooks from backup. Run regression after rule changes, verification at startup, restore after hookify updates.
